Bridge.desc: You're on the main bridge of the ship.  A Large window gives a view out to the endless void of space surrounded by multiple workstations.

Ready Room.desc: This is the captain's private ready room.  It contains a large desk that has a few drawers and a computer opposite a few chairs and a couch off to the side.

Sick Bay.desc: You see beds surrounded by various medical equipment.

Storage Closet.desc: A small room with several shelves holding various pieces of mostly useless equipment.

Observation Deck.desc: A combination of a lounge and a mess hall for the crew, the observation deck has a giant window, a large table and several comfortable chairs.

Cargo Bay.desc: Insert description of the room here.

closet door.desc: There's a door to the storage closet.

body.desc: The body of an officer is slumped against a wall.

air tank.ground_desc: You see a cylindrical tank marked 'air' here.

launch code.ground_desc: You see a note with the ship's launch codes here.

hydrospanner.ground_desc: There's a hydrospanner here, a common tool to maintain and repair spacecraft.
